price: Dan Kami selamatkan dia (Ibrahim) dan Luṭ ke suatu negeri yang telah Kami berkahi untuk seluruh alam.533)
arabic: وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: *533) Negeri Syam, termasuk di dalamnya Palestina. Allah memberkahi negeri itu, artinya kebanyakan nabi berasal dari negeri ini dan tanahnya pun subur.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wanajjaynāhu walūṭan ilā al-arḍi allatī bāraknā fīhā lil'ʿālamīna
